archimate:Requirement.name: Support of Tietoevry Connect assets and deliveries in Public Cloud, Hybrid and private cloud agreed to be in scope
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
The VA service is a standardized service cross all units and need to support all enviroments where Tietoevry deliver services.
Public Cloud, Private Cloud, Hybrid Environment
Public Cloud services
As a Security Resource in TEMA I need to ensure that the Vulnerability Scan Service has capabilities to support a hybrid environment with resources in both Public Cloud and Private Cloud (OnPrem) to ensure that the service cover the complete infrastructure
